name: Ebay Cherry Blossom
description:
Ebay Cherry Blossom
by Stylish v1.0
additional_info: eBay Inc. (/ˈiːˌbeɪ/ EE-bay) is a multinational e-commerce corporation based in San Jose, California that facilitates consumer-to-consumer and business-to-consumer sales through its website. eBay was founded by Pierre Omidyar in 1995, and became a notable success story of the dot-com bubble. Today, eBay is a multi-billion-dollar business with operations in about 30 countries
